Method Detail

delete

public int delete(boolean flush,
                  java.lang.Long... ids)
Description copied from interface: DeletableDAO
Remove permanently the entities whose identifiers are contained in the array ids, optionally flushing the changes to the database. Returns the number of entities removed. If any identifier does not correspond to any existent entity, do nothing on it and continue the deletion. Any exception thrown by the underlying implementation is encapsulated in a DaoException.

Specified by:
delete in interface DeletableDAO<Group>
Overrides:
delete in class BaseDAOImpl<Group>
Returns:
the number of removed entities

getGroupMemberCount

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getGroupMemberCount()
Description copied from interface: GroupDAO
Returns a Map containing, as key, the group name, and as value, the member count for that group, ordered by nature (members then brokers) and name If any exception is thrown by the underlying implementation, it should be wrapped by a DaoException.

Specified by:

search

public java.util.List<? extends Group> search(GroupQuery query)
                                       throws DaoException
Description copied from interface: GroupDAO
Searches groups according to the given query. Results should be ordered by name by default. If the sortByNature flag is set on the query object, then the nature (first admin, then member, then broker) plus the group name should be used to determine the ordering. If no Group can be found, returns an empty List. If any exception is thrown by the underlying implementation, it should be wrapped by a DaoException.

Specified by:
search in interface GroupDAO
Throws:
DaoException
